Valid for select 2026 sailings Description Sail through the heart of Portugal’s renowned Douro Valley, where golden hills, terraced vineyards, and charming villages await. Begin in Porto with an evening Illuminations Cruise, then explore the “City of Bridges” and sample its famous Port wines. Enjoy lunch at a local quinta, visit the elegant Mateus Palace, and discover Lamego’s baroque beauty and traditional Bôlas pastries. In Pinhão, experience authentic wine country hospitality with tastings, scenic hikes, and regional cuisine before visiting the medieval village of Castelo Rodrigo. Conclude your journey in Vega de Terrón, carrying with you the warmth, flavor, and spirit of Portugal.
